com.rift.coad.lib.interceptor
Class InterceptorFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.interceptor.InterceptorFactory

public class InterceptorFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for returning interceptors constructed with reference to the coadunation internals. So that incoming threads can be boot strapped appropriatly.

Method Summary
protected  ClientInterceptor getClientInterceptor()
          This method returns a reference to the client interceptor.
protected static InterceptorFactory getInstance()
          This method returns a reference to the rmi interceptor factory singleton.
protected  ServerInterceptor getServerInterceptor()
          This method returns a reference to the server interceptor.
static InterceptorFactory init(ThreadsPermissionContainer permissionContainer, UserSessionManager userSessionManager, UserStoreManager userStoreManger)
          This method instanciates the rmi interceptor factory
